content: this legal case involves a party organizer and another party who entered into an agreement for a party the other party paid a deposit of 1800 euros but the party did not take place as planned the other party requested a refund but the party organizer refused claiming a breach of the agreement the other party filed a legal complaint and the court ordered the party organizer to refund the deposit the party organizer appealed but the appeal court upheld the original decision the party organizer was also ordered to pay the other partys legal costs the case concluded with the party organizer refunding the deposit and covering the other partys legal expenses in another legal matter several parties reached a settlement agreement through mediation regarding an inheritance dispute they discussed the division of an inheritance and came to an agreement where one party received a share of the inheritance while the other party received monetary compensation the agreement was mediated by dr pb and involved ms arb ms lb ms b and mr b the dispute involved a donation of a property in villabate made by mr bb to his son fb during the mediation process fb declared his intention to relinquish ownership of the property leading to a successful mediation and agreement the agreement was valued at 21000 euros and the parties paid 1800 euros in mediation fees and expenses the agreement was signed and closed on november 4 2019
